title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Critical Literacy-Based Elementary Literature Appreciation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literary analysis skills and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students cultivate the ability to critically analyze social power dynamics within literary works.

Through project-based learning, students analyze at least three literary works, develop two or more instructional materials (worksheets, PPTs, videos, etc.) applicable to medical/nursing education based on the analysis, and achieve an average of 4/5 points or higher in peer/expert evaluation rubrics.
Students acquire collaborative learning skills to explore the sociocultural context of works with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
